article_title: Rafael Cruz, father of GOP candidate, talks up son in Pinehurst
article_text:
Fayetteville, NC (28302)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun. High 87F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph..

Tonight

Partly cloudy skies. Low around 65F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: By Rodger Mullen Staff writer

og.description: PINEHURST - Alex de la Torre was sitting in the front row at Village Hall, waiting for Rafael Cruz, father of presidential candidate Ted Cruz, to begin speaking.
